    • org.sdnplatform.sync.internal中VectorClock的使用

      返回VectorClock的org.sdnplatform.sync.internal中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static VectorClock TUtils.getClock(int... nodes)
      Get a vector clock with events on the sequence of nodes given So getClock(1,1,2,2,2) means a clock that has two writes on node 1 and 3 writes on node 2.
      static VectorClock TUtils.getClockT(long timestamp, int... nodes)
      Get a vector clock with a the given timestamp and events on the sequence of nodes given So getClock(1,1,2,2,2) means a clock that has two writes on node 1 and 3 writes on node 2.
      static VectorClock TUtils.increment(VectorClock clock, int... nodes)
      Record events for the given sequence of nodes
      static VectorClock TUtils.incrementT(long timestamp, VectorClock clock, int... nodes)
      Record events for the given sequence of nodes
